deadEnd

public final double deadEnd
Odds of taking a dead-end and removing a wall from it, making a loop.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

delay

public final int delay
Time waited between each wall carving. Only used in debug mode, otherwise ignored. Set to zero for final product.

See Also:
